name: Lancer (Eyepatch)
description:
A short 2D platformer game I created for the Games Development unit in my I.T class. This was the first game project I was able to complete, it isn't very complex or high quality but I hope you enjoy it all the same.

The game is about Lancer, a rebel who fights against robots in a dystopian future.

[Note: Problems arose when transferring the game to HTML5. This includes sprites failing to load during an attack animation, as well as it being impossible to exit the settings screen due to the fact that the Escape key was used to back out of it and return to the title screen.]

Controls:

Right Key - Move Right

Left Key - Move Left

Spacebar - Jump

Up Key - Double Jump

C Key - Attack

V Key - Air Attack

Assets used: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16JkyUdCgJd04l5r1sTtHfiHKHyhJYcfe6w_o0bFt...
